title: Wasps recover from deficit to edge past Bristol Bears as Tyrrells Premier 15s heats up
text:
Wasps recovered from a 10-5 half-time deficit to narrowly edge past Bristol Bears 18-10 in the Tyrrells Premier 15s.

Replacement Claudia MacDonald proved the match winner for Wasps, finding a gap in Bristol’s defence with three minutes to go and racing away. Lizzie Goulden added the extra points to extend Wasps’ advantage to eight. Bristol tried a last roll of the dice with Lucy Attwood’s slick run taking them into the twenty-two, but Wasps’ defence stayed resolute.

“Huge game today that was contested from minute one to minute 80. Enormously proud of the girls for their performance and four valuable points gained on the road,” Giselle Mather, Wasps’ director of rugby, posted on Twitter in response...
description: Wasps recovered from a 10-5 half-time deficit to narrowly edge past Bristol Bears 18-10 in the Tyrrells Premier 15s.
